  1. Description
  2. Classes and Interfaces

Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.gui

package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.gui
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddCustomerWindow
    A GUI window that allows a user to create a new Customer record by entering the customer's name, phone, and email.
    AddFlightWindow
    A window that collects data for adding a new Flight with multiple seat capacities (economy, business, first) plus a base price.
    AdminReportsWindow
    A simple report window that shows total flights, customers, bookings, total revenue, and the most booked flight.
    CancelBookingWindow
    A GUI window that allows a user to cancel an existing booking by specifying the customer and flight IDs.
    IssueBookingWindow
    A window that lets a user issue a new booking by specifying a customer ID, flight ID, seat class, and food option.
    ListAllCustomersWindow
    A window that displays a table of all non-deleted customers (ID, Name, Phone, Email, Booking count).
    ListPassengersWindow
    A window that displays all passengers (customers) assigned to a specific Flight.
    MainWindow
    The main GUI window for the Flight Booking Management System.
    SearchFlightsWindow
    A window that allows users to search for flights based on optional origin, destination, and a date range.
    ShowBookingsWindow
    A window that can display either all system bookings or all bookings for a single customer, depending on which constructor is called.
    UpdateBookingWindow
    A window that allows updating a booking to a new flight, optionally changing the seat type.
